name: app_jabber
maintainer: Roadhouse Interactive and Infinite Game Publishing

app_jabber/db_fqdn.description: The domain name of the database server. Example: jabber-db.mywebsite.com

app_jabber/db_user.description: The user account to use when connecting to the database

app_jabber/db_password.description: The password for the specified account to use when connecting to the database

app_jabber/db_schema_name.description: Enter the name of the MySQL database schema to which applications will connect to.  The database schema should have been created when the initial database was first set up.  This input will be used to set the application server's database configuration file so that applications can connect to the correct schema within the database.  This input is also used for MySQL dump backups in order to determine which schema will be backed up.  Example: ejabberd

app_jabber/host_name.description: The host name served by the jabber server. Example: jabber.mywebsite.com
